mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(id, passwd, mname, nname, tel, zipcode, address1, address2, mdate) VALUES (#{id}, #{passwd}, #{mname}, #{nname}, #{tel}, #{zipcode}, #{address1}, #{address2}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT mno, id, passwd, mname, nname, grade, money, point, tel, zipcode, address1, address2, mdate FROM member ORDER BY mno ASC
